availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John James Outlaw (Hopkins Co. Ky, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Son of Lewis Outlaw and Elizabeth Outlaw. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 106B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, July 1863, p. 28.
"John James Outlaw (1829-1900)," Find A Grave, Memorial #11186112, accessed July 22, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/11186112.
